query: SELECT r.id, r.distance, r.date, r.scooterId, s.name as scooterName, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides FROM ridingRecords r LEFT JOIN scooters s ON r.scooterId = s.id WHERE r.userId = (SELECT userId FROM scooters WHERE name LIKE '%하코%' LIMIT 1) ORDER BY r.id DESC LIMIT 15;
